content: this is a cat toy stuffed with a cork from a wine bottle instead of polyfill or yarn scraps a cork gives the toy a good weight for thumping and skittering but won t leave floof everywhere when kitty tears it to shreds a little catnip inside the fish or letting the fish marinate in the catnip bag probably wouldn t hurt korkfisshe can be knit to sell for charity or for the personal use of a cat you like a lot the name korkfisshe is a play on korknisse 1 which are very cute 1 http //www saartjeknits nl/patterns/korknisse html
